Test Case Details: Validate all UI elements are visible on register page
Test Steps:
1. Navigate to /web/register
2. Verify page title is visible
3. Verify all input fields are visible
4. Verify register button is visible
5. Verify login link is visible
Expected Results: All elements should be visible and correctly labeled

Test Case Details: Validate all form field labels are correctly displayed
Test Steps:
1. Navigate to /web/register
2. Check Full Name label
3. Check Email Address label
4. Check Password label
5. Check Phone Number label
6. Check Address label
Expected Results: All labels should be visible with correct text

Test Steps:
1. Navigate to /web/register
2. Enter text in password field
3. Verify field type is password
Expected Results: Password characters should be masked

Test Case Details: Validate login link redirects to login page
Test Steps:
1. Navigate to /web/register
2. Click on 'Login here' link
3. Verify URL changes to /web/login
Expected Results: Should redirect to login page successfully

Test Case Details: Test name validation with less than 3 characters
Test Steps:
1. Navigate to /web/register
2. Enter 2 character name
3. Fill other valid fields
4. Click Register
5. Wait for alert
Expected Results: Alert: 'Name must be at least 3 characters long'

Test Case Details: Test name validation at minimum boundary
Test Steps:
1. Navigate to /web/register
2. Enter exactly 3 character name
3. Fill other valid fields
4. Click Register
Expected Results: Should accept 3 character name

Test Steps:
1. Navigate to /web/register
2. Leave name field empty
3. Fill other valid fields
4. Click Register
Expected Results: Should show validation error or HTML5 validation

Test Steps:
1. Navigate to /web/register
2. Enter email without @
3. Fill other valid fields
4. Click Register
Expected Results: Should show invalid email format error

Test Steps:
1. Navigate to /web/register
2. Leave email field empty
3. Fill other valid fields
4. Click Register
Expected Results: Should show validation error

Test Case Details: Test password with less than 6 characters
Test Steps:
1. Navigate to /web/register
2. Enter 5 character password
3. Fill other valid fields
4. Click Register
Expected Results: Should show password too short error

Test Steps:
1. Navigate to /web/register
2. Enter exactly 6 character password
3. Fill other valid fields
4. Click Register
Expected Results: Should accept 6 character password

Test Steps:
1. Navigate to /web/register
2. Enter password with only letters
3. Fill other valid fields
4. Click Register
Expected Results: Should show error: Password must contain at least one number

Test Steps:
1. Navigate to /web/register
2. Enter password with only numbers
3. Fill other valid fields
4. Click Register
Expected Results: Should show error: Password must contain at least one letter

Test Steps:
1. Navigate to /web/register
2. Leave password field empty
3. Fill other valid fields
4. Click Register
Expected Results: Should show validation error

Test Case Details: Test phone with less than 8 characters
Test Steps:
1. Navigate to /web/register
2. Enter phone with 7 characters
3. Fill other valid fields
4. Click Register
Expected Results: Should show phone length error

Test Steps:
1. Navigate to /web/register
2. Enter exactly 8 character phone
3. Fill other valid fields
4. Click Register
Expected Results: Should accept 8 character phone

Test Case Details: Test phone with more than 20 characters
Test Steps:
1. Navigate to /web/register
2. Enter phone with 21+ characters
3. Fill other valid fields
4. Click Register
Expected Results: Should show phone length error

Test Steps:
1. Navigate to /web/register
2. Enter exactly 20 character phone
3. Fill other valid fields
4. Click Register
Expected Results: Should accept 20 character phone

Test Steps:
1. Navigate to /web/register
2. Enter phone with letters
3. Fill other valid fields
4. Click Register
Expected Results: Should show error: Phone must contain only numbers and +

Test Steps:
1. Navigate to /web/register
2. Leave phone field empty
3. Fill other valid fields
4. Click Register
Expected Results: Should show error: Phone number is required

Test Steps:
1. Navigate to /web/register
2. Leave address field empty
3. Fill other valid fields
4. Click Register
Expected Results: Should show error: Address is required

Test Case Details: Test form submission with all empty fields
Test Steps:
1. Navigate to /web/register
2. Click Register without filling any fields
Expected Results: Should show validation errors or HTML5 validation

Test Case Details: Test successful user registration with all valid data
Test Data: name: John Doe, email: unique@test.com, password: test123, phone: +1234567890, address: 123 Test Street
Test Steps:
1. Navigate to /web/register
2. Fill all fields with valid data
3. Click Register
4. Wait for response
Post-Condition: User registered and redirected to login
Expected Results: Should show success message and redirect to /web/login

Test Case Details: Test registration with already registered email
Test Steps:
1. Navigate to /web/register
2. Fill form with existing user email
3. Fill other valid fields
4. Click Register
Expected Results: Should show error: User already exists
